site_name: Telecommunication Mast And Cabinet On Network Rail Land North Of Pond Near Footbridge
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed development, by reason of its siting and appearance, would result in a visually prominent and incongruous addition that would have an adverse and unacceptable impact on the character and appearance of the protected Wandsworth Common Conservation Area, Metropolitan Open Land and Site of Importance for Nature Conservation for Wandsworth. The proposal therefore fails to demonstrate acceptable siting and appearance contrary to Part 16 of the GPDO 2015 (as amended), NPPF (2021), the London Plan (2021) Policies LP1, LP2, LP22 and LP53 of the Wandsworth Local Plan (July 2023).
description: Determination as to whether prior approval is required for installation of a Distributed Antenna System base station consisting of an 8.1m high monopole mast with four attached antennas, an equipment cabinet and steel mesh grillage.
